org.junit.function
Interface ThrowingRunnable

public interface ThrowingRunnable

This interface facilitates the use of Assert.assertThrows(Class, ThrowingRunnable) from Java 8. It allows method references to void methods (that declare checked exceptions) to be passed directly into assertThrows without wrapping. It is not meant to be implemented directly.

Since:
4.13
